testcase.name: Check Claim Button Exists
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed And the user sees the "Assigned Orders List" list...........................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed Then the user sees the "Order Details" screen...............................passed And the user sees the "Claim" button........................................passed

testcase.name: Check Claimed Order By Clicking Claim Button
testcase.system-out: Given the user opens the application........................................passed And the user is logged in...................................................passed And the user sees the "Assigned Orders List" list...........................passed When the user clicks on one of the "Assigned Order Item" in the Assigned Orders list.passed And the user clicks on the "Claim" button...................................passed Then the order status switches to " DELIVERING".............................passed And the user sees the "Welcome" screen......................................passed
